headline: 1 Thing You Can Do To Make Your Internet Safer And Faster
keywords: 1.1.1.1, Resolver, DNS, Privacy, Product News, Mobile, Speed & Reliability
description: On April 1st, 2018, we announced 1.1.1.1, the fastest public DNS resolver in the world ???. Today, we are launching the 1.1.1.1 mobile app to make it incredibly easy to use 1.1.1.1 on your phone.
